meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to 1/60th of a minute.
meanings.sent1: I will be there in a second.
meanings.sent3: The second hand on the clock never stops moving.
meanings.sent4: Time flies by in a mere second.
meanings.sent5: The race was won by a split second.

meanings.definition: The position in a sequence or order, following first.
meanings.sent2: The second chapter of the book was exciting.
meanings.sent3: Being second in line has its advantages.
meanings.sent4: She always comes in second, never first.
meanings.sent5: The second day of the trip was the most memorable.

meanings.definition: To support or assist someone in a fight or argument.
meanings.sent2: She seconded his proposal during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: I seconded her decision to go on strike.
meanings.sent4: He seconded her argument with strong evidence.
meanings.sent5: They second each other in every debate.
